turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to place a Starbucks pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what would you like to order from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Venti cappuccino with 2% milk, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. and did you want any sweetener or syrups in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get three Splendas, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you want 1 venti cappuccino with 2% milk and 3 splendas, is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up in 10 minutes at the Starbucks on california street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy!
